definition: a body of students who graduate together
details:
noun
- a body of students who graduate together
= synonyms: class
- the period of time that it takes for a planet (as, e.g., Earth or Mars) to make a complete revolution around the sun
= example: the period of time that it takes for a planet (as, e.g., Earth or Mars) to make a complete revolution around the sun
- a period of time containing 365 days
= example: a period of time containing 365 days
= synonyms: twelvemonth
- a period of time occupying a regular part of a calendar year that is used for some particular activity
= example: a period of time occupying a regular part of a calendar year that is used for some particular activity
